reviews.review: Superb game, playing a game that will let you enhance your thinking :D
因为凝胶等新元素的引入让谜题比起一代更胜一筹，当然个人感觉难度也更胜一筹。完成实验的时候极有满足感。最后吐槽一下比起一代加入了很多非实验室部分的关卡，我这个路痴真的伤不起啊。

//퍼즐 게임 매니아라면 강추드리는 게임//

말 그대로 퍼즐 매니아라면 해볼 가치가 있다.
싱글과 멀티 둘 다 할수 있는 데다가 맵을 직접 만들어 할 수 있는 게임은 극히 드물다.
그리고 스토리도 탄탄하고 굳이 1탄을 하지 않아도 스토리를 이해할 수 있을 만큼의 재미를 선사해 준다.

도전 과제를 언락함으로써 얻는 모자들도  있다는것도 꽤 볼만하고
도전 과제를 깨면서 모자를 모으는 재미도 쏠쏠할 듯 하다.
(이 게임 내에 모자가 얼마나 있을  진 모르겠지만)

팬게임들도 재미있는 팬게임이 많아서  해보는 재미도 쏠쏠할 듯 하다.

결론은 강추

J'ai peut-être peu d'heures de jeu sur Portal 2, mais il reste néanmois l'une des plus belles expériences vidéoludiques que je n'ai encore jamais faite. Ce jeu sur le principe peut peraître assez simple, mais toute la physique du jeu est dépaysante, les décors sont sublimes et les dialogues sont tous cultes.. La première fois que j'ai fait le mode histoires, mes nuits se sont beaucoup raccourcies :D

Bref, ce jeu est génial, si vous ne l'avez pas, alors ACHETEZ LE ! De plus il est souvent en promo au prix de 5-7 euros :)

I defenitly recommend this game to anyone who is looking for a unique storyline and a lot of fun!

A more expansive story than Portal 2 with additional background story of the origins of Aparture Science, along with a few new features to increase the amount of puzzles that need solving. There's also a Co-op Campaign for those who want to see if they can work on solving test chambers with two rather than just themselves. (recommended only after completing the single-player campaign)

There is also a Test Chamber editing tool, which allows the player to make their own test chambers and upload them for others to play, it can ranged from the ridiculously easy to the masochistically hard, from the mundane to the creative. The only limits are a maximum test chamber size, the specifications of your machine, the amount of test chamber elements you have availible to you and your imagination.

Although not as good in some areas than the original (they rarely are) this game can provide much amusement for those that want to think their way around problems, rather than shoot it.

[h1]What I thought of Portal 2[/h1]
[b]In short (for people considering buying the game):[/b]
Portal 2 was an amazing game. One of the best I've played. It is a great brain game, when at the same time, it has a fantastic story, with great animation. It also happens to be very creative. Worth the 20$? Hell yes. Buy it right now.

[b]In Long (SPOILERS AHEAD):[/b]
This game was great. It was detailed, it had a great story line, and it had characters in it that really engage you into it like it's real. However, nothing's perfect. The strongest points of this game would be: The story line, the characters, and the puzzles. The part of the game I disliked the most was Chapter 6 (The Fall), and the beginning 7 (The Reunion). The reason is, I bought this game for more of the puzzle and thinking aspect, however chapters 6 and 7 mainly consisted of rummaging through the sewers of the Aperture lab trying to find portal-able walls. I personally found it just annoying, and was not stretching my brain at all. It was purely frustrating, and on those chapters, I mostly used tutorials. However, even though I disliked this part, it did not ruin the game. Actually, it was pretty frustrating at first when GLaDOS was taken over by Wheatley because I was filled with excitement that I was about to win the game, but boy was I wrong, since that was maybe a third into the game. However, I of course was happy for the game to go on. So, the best parts of the game definitely were the puzzles, or what GLaDOS and Wheatley referred to as "tests," and the worst (but still good) parts were chapter's 6 and 7. Again, this was one of the best video games I've ever played, and I hope we get more from Valve.

[i] Irei fazer uma análise bem curta [/i]

Eu achei um jogo de Puzzle bastante divertido (ou não), falando dele em si há diversos objetos e elementos que você deve usar para passar da fase (como caixas, "gosmas" com funcionalidades diferentes, raio laser, ondas de levitação...), sendo alguns dentro de salas de teste e outros fora (que muda mais a temática inicial).
Além dos Puzzles ocorre diversos diálogos por parte dos membros da Aperture Science (lugar onde é feito os testes) que são na maioria irônicos e bem divertidos, chega a dar mais um ânimo durante sua jogatina.

Eu terminei o jogo em 16 horas (7 pro Single Player e mais 9 pro Co-op), porém depende bastante do seu raciocínio (pode acabar tão antes ou empacar em alguma parte e demorar mais para terminar).
E eu não recomendo ver como passar na internet, passar por si próprio é bem mais satisfatório no fim.

Enfim... Mesmo sendo um jogo antigo, para mim, vale bastante a pena (ainda mais se tem um amigo para o Co-op).

尚未通关，先说两句。
传送门花了两小时通关了，然后就被这款游戏的设计深深地吸引住了。不管是游戏性还是剧情，在设定上都是非常惊艳的。不同于其他FPS游戏，传送门更像一款元素简单RPG，耐人寻味的剧情迫使这玩家追寻下一步的发展。再加上精妙绝伦的游戏方式(每一关都像是一个数学模型)，你要做的就是解析这个模型。
这些趣味在传送门2中也被完美地继承了，在游戏性上甚至得到了升华，在每个关卡中包含了更多的元素，使得玩家在游玩时能够得到比前作更大的成就感。
本人进度：目前正在从深渊往上爬，脑细胞死了挺多了……
Une tuerie, voilà. C'est tout.

Ein Meisterwerk und mittlerweile ein Klassiker. Mein spätes Review hat einen Grund: ich spiele es gerade mit dem Steam Controller auf SteamOS noch einmal im O-Ton durch und bin wirklich baff, wie gut es sich damit spielen lässt. Das Spiel selbst ist der Hammer - wer es noch nicht hat: spätestens im Sale kaufen und zocken! Die Portalgun ist mal was richtig neues gewesen und während der erste Teil noch Test an Test reihte, gibt's im zweiten eine coole Story drumrum und außerdem noch einen Coop-Modus für zwei Spieler wahlweise online oder im Splitscreen und Workshop Support mit etlichen Communitymaps.
portal 2 c tro b1

いわずと知れたValve製の3Dパズルアクション、Portalの二作目です。
ポータルガンという銃を使い、白い(とても重要)壁に青色と橙色の穴を開けると、二つの穴が行き来できるようになります。
これを利用して下に開けた穴に落下速度を持って降りて、横に開けた穴からその速度を持って飛び出すなどして先へと進んでいくのです。
ストーリーも繋がっており、一作目も全く同じシステムであるので、遊んだことのない方は是非、いや、絶対に前作からやりましょう。

絶対に前作からやりましょう。じゃないと後悔します。


感想：
一作目と比べると難易度は若干上昇したように思います。ストーリーのクリアまでにはおおよそ7時間ほどかかりました。
また、一作目と異なり、プレイしているとだんだんともの悲しいような、さびしいような、そんな気分にさせられます。
途中から最後までは本当にもやもやした気分になりますが、エンディング直前からエンディングでは、そこまでの感情が調味料となって、晴れやかな気分になりました。
一作目以上にストーリーへの没入間がすさまじく、また、未来へのこともふと考えさせられるようなゲームでありました。
もし、このゲームをプレイしたことも、動画を見たことも無いのであれば、ネット上で情報を調べずに一作目のPortalからやるべきです。
必ずやこのゲームは感動をもたらすことでしょう。

Simply, it's Portal one but more polished and amusing. If that's even possible. Oh, it also has endless puzzles in the workshop.

One of Valve's best games, with the addition of the community test chambers... Now I like making these test chambers, even if it's just one where I'm playing with the physics (not a published one). The storyline is good, physics, game mechanics... vice acting! Even the graphics. Too bad everyone left on that stupid boat...

The well awaited sequel to valves 2007 "Portal" Is back with new mechanics (as well as old ones). The games story has been stepped up, building on the foundations left behind by the original. Overall a fun and mind bending game that I'd recommend for all ages.

The debate between whether the original Portal or its sequel is the better game goes on and on between fans.  For me personally, I definitely side with Portal 2 being the superior game.  The controls are more responsive, the added puzzle mechanics make the puzzles even more fun and rewarding to solve, and the added story depth adds an emotional layer to the game.  My only complaint is that it sometimes drags a little when navigating in-between puzzles, but it's a really minor complaint compared to all of the great things this game has going for it.
